contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 15th day of October, 2012, the Petition for Leave to File Petition for Allowance of Appeal Nunc Pro Tunc is GRANTED. Counsel of record is directed to file a Petition for Allowance of Appeal within 30 days of this order. See Pa.R.Crim.P. 122(B)(2), Comment (counsel’s appointment effective through allocatur phase).
